description:
A treasure stealing invisible demon appears. An old lady who failed to defeat him asks Inuyasha and the gang for help. Inuyasha is in charge of guarding the second biggest mansion in town.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ein mysteriöser, unsichtbarer Dämon taucht auf!
Un monstruo invisible, lo ves o no lo ves
怪奇透明妖怪現る現る!
